main event: A UFO sighting of a large star-shaped object moving up and down was reported in Tuxedo, New York on 15 February 1957.
interesting points: The object was described as having characteristics similar to a natural phenomenon., The observation lasted for approximately 13-14 minutes., The object had no discernible features or noise., Witnesses reported seeing smaller objects emerge from the main object., Details of the sighting were limited but recorded in the Project Blue Book archives.
witness description: A physician and his wife observed the object together.
